com.serena.dmclient.api
Interface DimensionsDatabaseAdmin

All Superinterfaces:
DimensionsObject
public interface DimensionsDatabaseAdmin
extends DimensionsObject

This interface represents a Dimensions base database and provides access to a mixture of read/write and read-only collections of top-level administration objects.

It differs from the DimensionsDatabase interface as it returns collections of Dimensions objects as implementations of the DimensionsObjectCollection rather than as a java.util.List.

See Also:
DimensionsDatabase, DimensionsObjectCollection

Method Detail

authorize

void authorize(java.lang.String networkNode,
               java.lang.String username,
               java.lang.String password)
               throws DimensionsDatabaseAdmin.AuthFailedException
Authorizes the specified user to perform tertiary node access to items located on the remote node.

Parameters:
networkNode - the name of the node where the items are stored.
username - the OS username for the specified node.
password - the OS password for the specified node.
Throws:
DimensionsDatabaseAdmin.AuthFailedException - if login fails.

runCommand

void runCommand(java.lang.String command)
                throws DimensionsDatabaseAdmin.CommandFailedException,
                       java.lang.IllegalStateException
Executes a Dimensions command.

Parameters:
command - Dimensions command string.
Throws:
DimensionsDatabaseAdmin.CommandFailedException - if the specified command fails.
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if user has not logged in.
java.lang.NullPointerException - if command is null.

getAttributeDefinitions

BaseDatabaseAttributeDefinitions getAttributeDefinitions(java.lang.Class objectClass,
                                                         AttributeType attrType)
                                                         throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
Returns the collection of all attribute definitions in this base database.

Note: the Attribute Definitions returned do not include those defined for the $GENERIC product.

Parameters:
objectClass - the parent object type class for which to search for definitions, one of Request.class, Baseline.class, ItemRevision.class
attrType - the kind of attributes that must be returned, for example AttributeType.SFSV
Returns:
the collection of all attribute definitions in this base database.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if objectClass is not one of the specified allowable values.
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if user has not logged in
